name: Fix Wikia Header
description:
This script disables the awful Wikia header and replaces it with something a lot more aesthetically pleasing and user friendly.

Now also fixes the chat after their 4/20 update.
additional_info:
The colors currently go with a specific Wiki. If you want to use it on other Wikis you can change the color where it says "color: #6B30A6 !important;"

Also, please note this style may not work as intended unless you have added the filters listed here (http://pastebin.com/QW7w3XEN) for Adblock/Adblock Plus. The filters disable unwanted Wikia content and help the header look nicer. Replace "dragonvale" with your Wikia's name.
